issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi,

In my project i have using "Facebook login".It's not working error would be showed "Cannot Open Page Safari cannot open the page because the addredd is invalid."Please advice me

comments.body:
We need your environment information (OS, Studio, SDK, CLI versions) and a simple test case to reproduce this problem. Have you tried following the steps and sample code provided in the documentation?

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/api/Modules.Facebook

Resolving this ticket as we have not received the requested information and we have not been able to reproduce this issue. We would be happy to reopen this ticket if you can provide us the steps to reproduce the issue.
